resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74011</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f8-f814-4381-221a-5af480ac7dd6#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Albrech Dürer: Paumgartner-oltár, 1502-04, Alte Pinakothek, München, a középkép 155x206 cm, a szárnyak egyenként 151x61 cm, olaj, vászon.</string>
            <string language="en">Albrech Dürer:Altar Paumgartner, 1502-04, Alte Pinakothek, München, The Middle Picture 155x206 cm, Each Wings Are  151x61 cm, oil, Canvas.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Albrech Dürer:Altar Paumgartner, 1502-04, Alte 
Pinakothek, München, die mittlere Abbildung 155x206 Zentimeter, jeder
Wings sind 151x61 Zentimeter, Öl, Segeltuch.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Albrech Dürer:Altar Paumgartner, 1502-04, Alte 
Pinakothek, München, l'image moyenne 155x206 centimètre, chacun 
s'envole sont 151x61 centimètre, huile, toile.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Albrech Dürer:Altar Paumgartner, 1502-04, Alte 
Pinakothek, München, o retrato médio 155x206 cm, cada um voa é 
151x61 cm, óleo, lona.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Albrech Dürer:Altar Paumgartner, 1502-04, Alte 
Pinakothek, München, l'immagine centrale 155x206 centimetro, ciascuno
traversa è 151x61 centimetro, olio, tela di canapa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Albrech Dόrer:Altar Paumgartner, 1502-04, 
Alte Pinakothek, Mόnchen, η μέση εικόνα 155x206 εκατ., 
κάθε φτερά είναι 151x61 εκατ., πετρέλαιο, καμβάς.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Albrech Dürer:Altar Paumgartner, 1502-04, Alte 
Pinakothek, München, el cuadro medio 155x206 centímetro, cada uno se
va volando es 151x61 centímetro, aceite, lona.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Középen árkádos épület előtt a Szent család, körülöttük a pici alakokként megjelenő donátorok, a szárnyakon két, páncélba öltözött szent.</string>
            <string language="en">The Saint Family In Front Of An Arcaded Building , Donators Like Little Shapes Around Them, On The Wings Two, Armoured Saints</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Albrecht Dürer,  16. század,  szárnyasoltár,  Szent család,  Paumgartner oltár,  </string>
            <string language="en">Albrecht Dürer,  16 th Century,  Winged Altar,  Saint Family,  Paumgartner Altar,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Heiliger Familie Vor Einem Arcaded Gebäude, Donators 
Wie Wenig Formen Um Sie, Auf Den Flügeln Zwei, Gepanzerte Heilige</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Famille de Saint Devant Un Bâtiment d'Arcaded, 
Donators Comme de Petites Formes Autour d'Elles, Sur Les Ailes Deux, 
Saints Blindés</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Família Na frente De um Edifício De Arcaded, Donators 
Como Formas Pequenas Em torno DElas, Nas Asas Dois, Saints Armoured De
Saint</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Famiglia Davanti Un Edificio Di Arcaded, Donators Come 
Le Figure Piccole Intorno Loro, Sulle Ale Due, San Corazzati Del San</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η οικογένεια Αγίου μπροστά από ένα με στοές κτήριο,
donators συμπαθεί τις μικρές μορφές γύρω από τους, στα φτερά 
δύο, τους θωρακισμένους Αγίους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Familia Delante De un Edificio De Arcaded, Donators 
Como Pequeñas Dimensiones de una variable Alrededor De Ellas, En Las 
Alas Dos, Santos Armados De Santo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Albrecht Dürer, Th 16 Jahrhundert, Winged Altar, 
Heiliger Familie, Paumgartner Altar,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Albrecht Dürer, siècle du Th 16, autel à ailes, 
famille de Saint, autel de Paumgartner,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Albrecht Dürer, século do th 16, altar voado, 
família de Saint, altar de Paumgartner,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Albrecht Dürer, secolo del Th 16, altar alato, 
famiglia del San, altar di Paumgartner,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Αλψρεθχτ Dόrer, αιώνας θορίου 16, φτερωτός βωμός, 
οικογένεια Αγίου, βωμός Paumgartner,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Albrecht Dürer, siglo del th 16, altar con alas, 
familia de Santo, altar de Paumgartner,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
